CodeSystem: JP Core Procedure Codes Medical CodeSystem

項目内容
定義URL http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/core/CodeSystem/JP_ProcedureCodesMedical_CS
Version 1.1.0a
Name

JP_ProcedureCodesMedical_CS
Title

JP Core Procedure Codes Medical CodeSystem
Status Active ( 2022-09-26 )
Copyright

FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

処置のコード:医科診療行為マスタ

This Code system is referenced in the content logical definition of the following value sets:

  • JP_ProcedureCodesMedical_VS

This code system http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/core/CodeSystem/JP_ProcedureCodesMedical_CS defines the following codes:
